msbt.message: Furniture's funny, . You can change a room up just by movin' all the stuff around in it. Seein' how you set yours up says a lot about how your mind works.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your bed looks nice and comfy.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Even an ol' toss-and-turner like me could probably fall asleep in it.
Watch much TV, ?I figured I'd just watch the news because I got tired of nonsense and wanted somethin' more serious But these days, the news is just a bunch of goofy nonsense too.

<20_2 arg="10" />Whoa, you like music? I like it too! <20_3 arg="6" />Last thing I do most days is listen to some music to try and relax When you got a temperament like mine, lotsa stuff riles you up. So let's listen to tunes and unwind.

<20_2 arg="10" />Look at that, <20_2 arg="9" />How'd it get to be already? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />"Time flies when you're having fun."'Course these days, time flies no matter what I'm doin'. It's scary!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I see you got a green thumb<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Your is lookin' real nice, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, your tub's not bad at all. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Gotta have a nice, deep one for soakin' all your troubles away.
<20_2 arg="10" />I could use somethin' like <20_2 arg="9" />your <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Classy lookin', perfect height, and lotsa room to put my feet up on it.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice . Your favorite? You need a favorite.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Everyone needs a place where they can sit a spell and feel comfy.
<20_2 arg="10" />Why do you have ?<20_3 arg="6" />Wait, can you play? Kinda seein' you in a new light now,
Can't help noticin' you got yourself <20_2 arg="10" />a fancy .<20_3 arg="6" />So does that mean you can cook?'Cause I wouldn't say no to a nice home-cooked meal,
Do you know your way around <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Exercisin' is a fine idea, but I'd hate to see you go and hurt yourself.
<20_2 arg="10" />Well, look at you and your !<20_3 arg="6" />Reckon someone loves the great outdoors as much as yours truly. Nothin' like fresh air, !
